=Feature request=

Here you can request a feature you like to see in next release. You can request a feature by placing a comment or go to the [http://code.google.com/p/pbsviewer/issues/list issue page] (for advanced users). If you don't want to create a google account you can always post your comment here:

http://www.beesar.com/work/php/pbsviewer/development/

Or you can contact me personally, see [http://www.beesar.com/contact/ contact page].
